root.name: Mystery Quest: Curse of the Ancient Spirits
root.description: OverviewMystery Quest Curse of the Ancient Spirits is a hidden object adventure game that takes place during the 1950s. You are in control of Virginia as her and her father are travelling the Caribbean and stumble upon what appears to be a deserted ship of Christopher Columbus. In the ship lies a number of artifacts somehow untouched by time. Why are these treasures here? Why after 500 years are they in the same condition they would have been when the ship was deserted? And why is the ship on the island at all? These are all questions that you will have to try to discover the answers to.GameplayMystery Quest Curse of the Ancient Spirits is an adventure game spanning 42 locations. It follows the basic premise as most puzzle/adventurerers on the DS. The top screen showing the location you are in and the bottom screen utilized for puzzle solving and the like. There are more then 50 levels to complete and 1000 hidden objects to find during your adventure. The game also features 12 mini-games that can be played outside of the main story for additional challenges.
